title: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens, v1.03 (build 1.0.0.33084) + 12 DLCs
body:
LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens, v1.03 (build 1.0.0.33084) + 12 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Third-person, 3D
Companies: TT Games / Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 18.7 GB
Repack Size: from 7 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable)
  • Filehoster: 1fichier (Uploaded by Marty McFly, NOT compatible with MultiUpload mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on LEGO.STAR.WARS.The.Force.Awakens.v1.03.incl.DLC-CODEX ISO release: codex-lego.star.wars.the.force.awakens.iso (20,101,824,512 bytes)
  • All DLCs included and activated
  • Additional cracks from 3DM and ALI213 added to NoDVD folder and available after installation
  • Unlike most of my repacks this one is 100% Lossless but NOT MD5 Perfect: game resources were unpacked – without it repack would be impossible
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can skip downloading and installing of speech packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 18.7 to 7~9.4 GB, depending on selected languages)
  • Installation takes 15-50 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 31 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language

Game Description

The Force is strong with this one… The No. 1 LEGO® videogame franchise triumphantly returns with a fun-filled, humorous journey through the new Star Wars adventure. Play as all of the characters from the movie, including Rey, Finn, Poe Dameron, Han Solo, Chewbacca, C-3PO, and BB-8, as well as Kylo Ren, General Hux and Captain Phasma.

In LEGO® Star Wars™: The Force Awakens™, relive the epic action from the blockbuster film in way that only LEGO can offer, featuring brand new story content from the Star Wars Universe that explores the time between Star Wars: Return of the Jedi and Star Wars: The Force Awakens.

LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens introduces new gameplay mechanics, including the enhanced Multi-Builds system, where players can choose from multiple building options to advance the game, or engage in intense new Blaster Battles for the first time, utilizing surrounding environments to drive back the First Order.”

Included DLCs

  • Droid Character Pack
  • Escape from the Starkiller
  • Jabba’s Palace Character Pack
  • Jakku: Poe’s Quest for Survival
  • Prequel Trilogy Character Pack
  • Rebels Character Pack
  • Takodana: Galactic Outlaw Crossroads
  • The Clone Wars Character Pack
  • The Empire Strikes Back Character Pack
  • The Freemaker Adventures Character Pack
  • The Jedi Character Pack
  • The Phantom Limb Level Pack

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT compatible with my first repack of the game.
